TextView.android:text: Considered an international first-class hotel in Jammu and Kashmir, the Radisson Blu Jammu provides top-notch services and amenities in the state's commercial capital. Our location on the Jammu-Srinagar Bypass near Katra NH-1A and Jammu Airport also allows for convenient travel in and out of the area. Bahu Plaza is just 500 meters from the hotel, providing easy access to client meetings, and shopping options at Wave Mall and Big Bazar are less than one kilometer away for leisure travelers. During your stay, rest well in sophisticated rooms and suites with free Wi-Fi, minibars, and 43-inch LED smart TVs. Between meetings, three delicious restaurants and upper upscale amenities like a full-service spa invite you to put the work away and relax. With nearly 40,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor event space, our hotel can host nearly any type of event, from interviews and conferences to kitty parties and grand weddings. We even offer a dedicated video conferencing room for those who need to include the office back home. Let us help you create a memorable meeting!

Located in the bustling part of the city, Lemon Tree Hotel, Jammu is opposite to the Jammu Tawi railway station, and offers a comfortable home away from home for both business and leisure travelers alike. In close proximity to the Wave Mall, Big Bazaar and Bahu Plaza the popular shopping and entertainment pivots of the city, it is 20 minutes away from Mubarak Mandi Palace-the royal residence of the Maharaja of Jammu and Kashmir; the over 3000 years old Bahu Fort and Garden and Raghunath Temple, one of the largest temple complexes of north India. The hotel also offers easy access to Bari Brahmna, the industrial area and largest manufacturing centre of Jammu and Kashmir. A vibrant lobby ushers you into 39 stylish and spacious rooms that help you unwind with their fresh and bright interiors, smart in-room amenities and refreshing services. Together with a 24x7 multi-cuisine coffee shop – Citrus Café, a hip recreation bar- Slounge, a full equipped fitness center and a modern conference room, the hotel leaves no stone unturned to pamper and delight its guests. The hotel is an ideal place of stay for the pilgrims visiting Vaishno Devi and the Kashmir valley. It also offers an perfect base to travelers transiting to Poonch (240 kms), Doda(167 kms) and Leh-Ladakh (817 km).
Country Inn & Suites by Radisson Jammu

Nestled in the heart of the city, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson Jammu provides business and leisure guests with a contemporary, full-service hotel near local corporations and the banks of the scenic Tawi River. You’ll find the Jammu Tawi railway station within one kilometer of the hotel, and the city’s main business hub, Bahu Plaza, lies just across the street. When you’re ready to explore the historic roots of the area, drive less than 25 kilometers to discover architectural gems such as Raghunath Temple and Amar Mahal Museum & Library. After an adventurous trek along the Doda trail, you can relax your muscles with a soothing dip in the hotel’s outdoor pool or with a rejuvenating treatment at the on-site spa. Here on business? Review your meeting notes in the 24-hour business center before gathering with colleagues in our on-site meeting facilities.
